entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is feeling extremely stupid due to an incident involving Hermione and Rita's article.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione has come in for her fair share of unpleasantness and is handling the situation with dignity.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is a Slytherin girl who is mocking Hermione's appearance.

entities.name: rita
entities.description: Rita has written an article that has caused unpleasantness for Hermione.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is giving detentions to Harry and Ron.

relationships.description: Harry has admiration for the way Hermione is handling the situation.
Pansy Parkinson is mocking Hermione's appearance.
Harry and Ron are not speaking to each other since Harry told Ron about Snape's detentions.
